P-4 P409 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R34) 2002 JGTC Series GT500 Class 8th Place S. Motoyama/M. Krumm




Satoshi Motoyama & Michael Krumm drove the #22 Xanavi Nissan Skyline for the Nismo team in the 2002 JGTC Series. The overall red & sliver color scheme is the same as the sister #23 Castrol Pitwork car with some differences in sponsor logos. The car seen here is the 2.6L RB26-powered version used for the first half of the season. Mid-way through the season the engine was changed to the new, more powerful 3.0L VQ30 engine. Either by coincidence or due to the more powerful engine, their best results came in the second half of the season with second place finishes in rounds 5 and 7. Motoyama & Krumm finished the season in 8th place in the GT500 class.
